meanings.definition: A period of time during which something takes place.
meanings.sent1: During the whiles of the party, everyone danced happily.
meanings.sent2: I read a book during the whiles of the long train journey.
meanings.sent3: The whiles of waiting for the cake to bake felt like forever.
meanings.sent4: The whiles of the storm passing were filled with tension and anticipation.
meanings.sent5: The whiles of the sunset painted the sky in beautiful colors.

meanings.sent1: I will cook dinner whiles you set the table.
meanings.sent2: She sang whiles playing the guitar at the concert.
meanings.sent3: Whiles the dog barked, the cat slept peacefully.
meanings.sent4: The children laughed whiles playing in the park.
meanings.sent5: Whiles the rain fell, the flowers bloomed brightly.

meanings.definition: To pass time in a leisurely manner.
meanings.sent1: She whiles away the afternoon reading in the garden.
meanings.sent2: I like to whiles by the river, watching the water flow.
meanings.sent3: He whiles by chatting with his friends online.

meanings.sent5: They whiles together by exploring new hiking trails.
